file_content.text: I beg you to repair the drill controls first!
Protocol says to get the alarms online.
Please. Until the core settles, our humble exertions are the only thing keeping the groundquakes in check. This mesa could collapse if I cannot work.
Llane didn't make it. Protison's on one leg, but he can hold a rifle.
Nadrin, Sergeant--situation report, now.
What happened here?
I see the Archon hasn't given up. He sent mercenaries?
I can guess who did this.
Regulator team flew an assault shuttle in and hit hard.
Sergeant, correct? You're part of the support team?
Have we met?
I was Lord Cytharat's second. Trying to run security now, but the Archon's mercenaries hit us hard.
A Sith Lord stands among you. Need I say more?
You will give me due respect.
My lord, we were attacked by the Archon's forces. A dozen Regulators with an assault shuttle.
When I walk into a room, I expect you to focus. What's going on?
Attention, team!
Sir! The Archon's forces attacked. Small merc team with an assault shuttle.
Mistress Niar told me to hide, and I did, like a grubling. I heard her kill one of the enemy; then, only noise.
Cowards grabbed our people and ran. They wanted prisoners for interrogation.
If the Archon learns we saved Makeb, the Hutt fleet will never leave. We have to find Niar and the others.
We can't let our people talk.
Do we have a way to contact the Archon? Try to make a deal?
Can we negotiate for them?
You want to deal--? Sorry, right. Try the Cartel frequency.
There is no acknowledgment of our signal. I am profoundly sorry.
Look... Niar's tough, and so are my boys, but if the Archon works them long enough, someone will talk.
He learns we saved Makeb, the Hutts stop evacuating, we're back where we started.
The Archon won't hesitate to extract information by force. Niar will tell him everything--including our plans for Makeb.
Niar was weak. She'll break.
Damn it all.
The Archon will learn that the servants of the Empire belong to me and none other.
No one takes my followers.
There is also--forgive me for reiterating, but you should understand our predicament here.
I am monitoring the laser drilling, but without careful adjustment, we risk imminent release of subterranean toxins and continental devastation.
In short, all life on the planet is very likely to die if I am further distracted.
You're telling me you can destroy anything on Makeb just by adjusting the drills?
That makes a powerful weapon.
Not with precision. If you require very large areas obliterated... perhaps? But I cannot imagine why.
Stay focused, Nadrin, and we'll all be fine. Don't let this continent fall apart.
So don't get distracted.
You're the scientist, Nadrin. Get a handle on the situation and let me focus.
I don't need another problem.
You'd better go. The prisoners will have landed by now, which means the Archon's probably shining up his pain droids.
Yes, my lord.
Yes, sir.
That shuttle flew toward the Archon's estates. I'm down to two fit men and one blaster pack--but if you want to hit back, I can get you field intel.
I want to know exactly what our enemy has prepared. What are the estate's defenses?
Tell me what I'm facing.
The Regulator mercenaries have installations all over the planet. Unless you're tracking that shuttle, our people could be anywhere.
We don't know their location.
Agreed, but Niar has been tracking the Archon for a while. You get him, doesn't matter where the others went.
The Archon has insulted me for the last time. I will teach him fear.
Vengeance is rightfully mine.
I'm tired of playing a proxy war. I'm going to find the Archon and kill him.
I've got a score to settle.
I'll take care of the Archon. Flamethrower or carbonite freeze?
Time to kill a Hutt.
Make it hurt.
Expect a lot of automation: droids, turrets, particle shields... anything the Archon would hold back or couldn't use on the battlefield.
He knows you're coming, and he's got the home-team advantage. So basically, it's a death trap.
Besides, if he makes them talk... the Hutt fleet will melt you, me and Nadrin's drills from orbit. Give him hell.
However may I serve?
